title: Retro Font?
content:
I need to figure out the name of this retro looking font. Does anyone know this font or know of anything close to it?

 [‹ HELP! What are the fonts for these magazine titles / logos?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907032440/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42099 "Go to previous forum topic") [PUBLIC SCHOOL 20 FONT ID ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907032440/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42578 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Jenna0609

comments.content:
That’d be [Murray Hill](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907032440/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/murray-hill-sh/).

Edit: Bitstream offers a [Lighter version](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907032440/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/murray-hill/).

Whatthefont.com pulls through again... It’s Murray Hill

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/murray-hill/murray-hill/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907032440/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/murray-hill/murray-hill/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/murray-hill/murray-hill/")

EDIT:  
mike, you beat me... I cheated too. It looked like a Veer face at first
you guys are awesome! thank you!
